name: School Nerd in Haunted House
description:
School Nerd in Haunted House is a Plataformer Horror Themed Game.

You was challenged by his friends to spend a night in this haunted mansion .. They Prove that you are not the biggest school asshole! Keep Alive this Adventure Freaky !

*some bug fixes!

Controls: Arrows, X, Z

Press UP+ X for special weapon
